other_tests.findings: A newly discovered TSHR mutation L665F in transmembrane helix 7 of the receptor was detected in six members of this family, indicating constitutive activation for the Gs pathway.
The index patient underwent thyroid surgery after experiencing increased free T4 levels exceeding 40.94 pmol/L.
Thiamazol therapy led to normal fT4 levels in treated children.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Currently, all thiamazol-treated children show normal fT4 and fT3 values during the antithyroid drug treatment for varying durations.

other_tests.findings: Increased free T4 (fT4) and free T3 (fT3) with suppressed TSH at presentation in multiple individuals.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The youngest child exhibited TSH suppression at 6 months and was treated for hyperthyroidism starting at 2 years.
